name: Xcode-opencv-template
tagline: Template for configuring Xcode to run Opencv programs
body:
Preferred method of installation [Macports] (https://www.macports.org).
Install opencv using `sudo port install opencv`.
***
Once installed, copy the `.xctemplate` to 
 `~/Library/Developer/Xcode/Templates/Application/Project Templates/OpenCV/` (Create any non-existent sub directory)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
